I miss my parents, but they live far away.
I run track for myself.
my son was born completely blind.
i love bicycling.
I played video games to pass the time on my last vacation.

participant_2.background:
I am single and enjoy my freedom to pursue my hobbies like fishing.
I'm not in a band, but I like Bon Jovi and I've owned two Mustangs.
I get to share my love of animals and storytelling with others.
I once got a chocolate bar that my dog didn't like, so I got to eat it all!
i like spending time with friends playing sports and going to country concerts.

content.text: What do you like to do for fun?
I love music, sports, and spending time with my dog.
What's your favorite sport to play?
I enjoy playing football and basketball the most.
I miss playing sports. I used to play track and field, but I had to stop when I went to college.
That's too bad. I love running track and field.
I miss my parents too. They live far away from me.
I'm single and I enjoy my freedom to pursue my hobbies.
I'm single too. I have a son who was born completely blind.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure he's a great kid.
He is. He's my pride and joy.
I'm sure he's a great kid. He's lucky to have you as a father.
Thanks. I hope he grows up to be happy and successful.
I'm sure he will. He's got a great role model in you.
No problem. Thanks for talking to me.
